Lobiel:
You may have heard the name Sayune before? Perhaps as an agent of travel, or flight? Or perhaps as a legendary hero of the Giants? Well, in truth, he is both. His father was Saia, the God of wind, and his mother was a giant. Out of their love was bom (yellow)Sayune(yellow), who embodied the lightness of his father and the intelligence of his mother. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1 | "What an odd pair!"]
